journeys
& notes

an app for the spaces between

a journal for your journeys

The road is a place of wonder and inspiration. From prosaic thoughts to bursts of creative brilliance, the trips we take and the ideas we have along the way are treasures worth keeping near.

a community of travellers

We see one another on our adventures: riding on the bus, pacing the platform, quickly eating breakfast during a morning commute. For the briefest of moments we are together, a community on the train.

secrets and stories of the road

Stones left by hikers pile up into cairns telling stories of wayfarers long past. We each have own stories of the road and its secrets. Sometimes, like stones, we leave these behind too, sharing them with those who travel the road with us.

What is journeys & notes about?
